sentences.sentence: The government has been offering tax credits, accelerated depreciation, and other economic hanky-panky.
sentences.translation: 政府一直在搞税款抵免，快速折旧及其它经济花招。

sentences.sentence: Now Mr Anwar has been linked to more hanky-panky, this time with a woman.
sentences.translation: 现在安瓦尔先生又陷入另一场更大的丑闻中，这一次是与一个女人。

sentences.sentence: Since my customers are such suckers, I can now engage in profitable hanky-panky and none will be the wiser.
sentences.translation: 既然我的顾客们都如此沉迷于票据，那我可以略施小计额外挣点钱，没有人能比我更聪明了。
